## SWMPrExtension Installation

- Manually from CRAN
```
> install.packages("SWMPrExtension")
```
- Manually from GitHub
  - Gets any updates not yet pushed to CRAN

```
> install.packages("devtools")
> library(devtools)
> devtools::install_github("NOAA-OCM/SWMPrExtension")
```
